attributes.action: we must take action against the wrongful and racist laws of south africa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the world has gone silent on the corrupted goverment of south africa, 
it now time to take action, on the corrupt goverment, and there racist laws against the white south africans

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
